column.name: DWH_SOURCE_IND
column.comment: Indicator from which system the data record comes (2: Debit, 3: Credit).

column.name: MARKET_CODE
column.comment: Market to which the customer is assigned. Examples are MMC (credit customers who have a contract with VfD2), PUC (credit customers who have a contract with a partner company), MMO (prepaid customers who are directly assigned to VfD2), PUA (prepdaid customers who have a partner company) are), XMK (Cross Market).

column.name: SK_NUM
column.comment: The Skeleton contract number identifies the Skeleton contract in the system. The Skeleton contract number contains the following:   First digit represents the Subsidiary.   Second digit represents the Class.   Four remaining digits are user defined.

column.name: EFFECTIVE_DATE
column.comment: effective change date

column.name: COND_CD
column.comment: The Condition code of this subscriber (for skeleton contracts)

column.name: SYS_CREATION_DATE
column.comment: Date of creation of the data record in the operative system

column.name: SYS_UPDATE_DATE
column.comment: Date of modification of the data record in the operative system

column.name: OPERATOR_ID
column.comment: Unique ID of the last user

column.name: APPLICATION_ID
column.comment: Unique ID of the application that last processed the sentence

column.name: TARIFF_OPTION
column.comment: TARIFF_OPTION aus KIAS2000

column.name: WAF_TARIFF_OPTION
column.comment: Waive the Activation fee for the Tariff option. This attribute determines whether or not the Tariff option Activation fee is waived.

column.name: DISCOUNT_GROUP
column.comment: The discount program code for the Group.

column.name: HIERARCHY_IND
column.comment: This attribute defines whether Subscribers (or the Subscriber's Billing Account) who chose this condition must be under a major BAN.

column.name: BAN
column.comment: Indication of the customer's billing account number. The customer is the (natural or legal) person to whom services are provided on the basis of a contract concluded with D2-Vodafone. The customer is responsible for payment for the services used by himself or by other participants belonging to him. If the customer account is assigned to a higher-level account (consolidated account), the higher-level account can also be responsible for payment.

column.name: POTENTIAL
column.comment: wird nachgepflegt (A. Breeden)

column.name: EQ_PRICE_CD
column.comment: This code represents a list of equipment and prices that are eligible for SK customers under certain circumstances.

column.name: EQ_VENDOR_CD
column.comment: This code represents a list of discounts at the vendor level. These are eligible for SK customers under certain circumstances.

column.name: EQ_CATEGORIES_CD
column.comment: This code represents a list of equipment categories and subcategories, with their corresponding discounts or flat rates.

column.name: DESCRIPTION
column.comment: Beschreibung

column.name: EXPIRATION_DATE
column.comment: Ablaufdatum

column.name: BLOCK_DATE
column.comment: The Block date definition is not mandatory but when defined, becomes the contract end date for re-negotiations. E.g., 27/02/2000. When the contract is extended during re-negotiations, the block date is updated. As long as the block date is a future date, all subscription contracts are taken from the block date, prolongation and cancellation (regardless of their Tariff option contract type). When the block date has expired, without an extension: · For those who joined the Skeleton contract after the block date, the contract is fully taken from their Tariff option contract type, regardless of the block date. · For the "old" subscriptions, the contract is taken from their Tariff option contract type, where the block date replaces the contract start date.

column.name: PROLONGATION
column.comment: This attribute indicates the number of months that the contract should be prolonged when the contract is re-negotiated. The field is FYI only, since the contract prolongation may change during re-negotiations.

column.name: CANCELLATION
column.comment: Number of months before the Block Date, when the contract should be negotiated. For example, three months before the block date.

column.name: COMP_SPECIFIC_IND
column.comment: Indicates whether the condition is specific for a company .

column.name: EQUIP_SPECIFIC_IND
column.comment: Indicates whether the condition is specific for certain equipment.

column.name: COND_STATUS
column.comment: The status at the condition level. If skeleton status

column.name: GROUP_ID
column.comment: ID der Rechnungspositionsgruppe

column.name: ADD_COM_SPECIFIC_IND
column.comment: Indicates whether the condition has specific additional commitment specifications.

column.name: DFL_SPECIFIC_IND
column.comment: Specific indicator for DFL (Directives for Legitimisaition)

column.name: WAIVE_RETENTION_IND
column.comment: Waive retention indicator. Valid values 'Y', 'N' and ' '.
